title: Here - speaker's complex attitude toward places

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Larkin uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the places he describes.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Larkin uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the places he describes.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
